"A.P.241/12/1 10:00": "...Oh? We're getting a transmission from Enga."
"Hello, hello! Xiera here! What can I help you with, Enga?"
"Oh, hey Xiera. I see <%me> is there too, perfect."
"Got some good news to report for once. We've located that girl who went missing from Earth, Rina Izumi."
"She doesn't remember a whole lot from the disappearance... But there's not a scratch on her. She's basically fine."
"Also, she apparently wants to talk to the two of you. Can I patch her through?"
"Of course. You're a friend of ARKS, so there's no problem."
"Thanks. I'm switching over then."
"Ah...er...um... Hello, this is Rina Izumi. I'm sorry for the disturbance I caused recently..."
"Oh, thank you for your consideration."
"I can't remember what happened clearly, but you know something, don't you? Didn't I cause a huge scene?"
"Umm...cause a scene, you say? What sort of idea of what happened do you have, exactly?"
"...It's a very vague sensation. I get the feeling that I bared myself somehow, and it was incredibly embarrassing..."
"Ah...Well, that is what happened."
"So you do know what I did!? Please, what in the world did I say!?"
"Rina the Isolated"
"Partnerless"
"Hrk...! Isolated... partnerless... Some kind of memories are coming rushing back...!"
"Whoawhoawhoa! H-Hang on! You might be safe now, but the fact of the matter is you still went missing!"
"Right now you shouldn't be stressing yourself about what happened, you should be relaxing your body and mind. Especially your mind."
"I-if you say it like that, I'm just going to worry about it even more!"
"Rina"
